0.1.name: wordpress/self-shortener
0.1.description:
Self Shortener is a WordPress plugin to be able to handle URL shortening feature, by your WordPress site itself.

Self Shortener can:

  • create short URL using your site URL.
  • generate random short URL key, by specifying key length.
  • specify fix URL key instead of random generating.
  • handle I18N message. Currenly supports English and Japanese.

See http://giraffy.jp/products_en/wordpress/selfshortener/ . (In Japanese, http://giraffy.jp/products/wordpress/selfshortener/ )
